meanings.sent1: The mimetic bird copied the chirping of other birds.
meanings.sent2: Her mimetic behavior made her blend in with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The mimetic monkey tried to mimic the zookeeper's actions.
meanings.sent4: The mimetic painting was so realistic, it seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: The mimetic dance perfectly mirrored the movements of the lead dancer.

meanings.sent1: The mimetic robot replicated human movements flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: His mimetic skills allowed him to impersonate famous actors.
meanings.sent3: The mimetic parrot amused everyone by copying their words.
meanings.sent4: The mimetic camouflage of the insect fooled its predators.
meanings.sent5: The mimetic sculpture looked like a real person from a distance.

meanings.sent1: The mimetic behavior of the octopus helped it evade predators.
meanings.sent2: The mimetic patterns on the butterfly's wings served as protection.
meanings.sent3: The mimetic game required players to imitate animal sounds.
meanings.sent4: His mimetic talent in acting earned him a role in the play.
meanings.sent5: The mimetic design of the building resembled ancient architecture.
